title: [HELP] So I rolled a Pulsefire Ezreal skin in HT Crafting and unlocked him ..............
body:
But I didn't get the icon that comes with the skin. Is that normal since I'm basically receiving a $25 skin for free? If so, then how would I be able to get the icon now if I can no longer purchase him since I unlocked him? Does this mean that I can NEVER get the icon in any way?

Pls halp.

replies.body: Rest easy, the icons should unlock with the skin!  I looked into this for you and see that you already received!  The icons aren't in order though, so you may need to scroll down your list a bit to find it.  Let me know if that clears things up!
Ooh, I see! I'm so relieved. Thanks!!
